group_1.textRight: Your body's condition seems to@have improved since yesterday.

group_1.textLeft: The body of a Magical Girl is an extraordinary thing.
Its purpose is to fight Witches,@and thus it recovers so quickly.

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]...

group_1.textLeft: I thank you from the bottom of@my heart for your Coordination...

group_1.textRight: Although I do not have the skills of my teacher, I'm@pleased that I was of assistance, however slightly.

group_1.textLeft: I feel as though we're quite alike. You seem@cold and unfriendly at first glance,
but deep down, you are@actually quite compassionate.

group_1.textRight: My kindness is only skin deep.
My heart is utterly broken,
to the point I am entirely unconcerned with@matters like "pleasing" or "comforting" people.
This Coordination, too, was simply@the result that my notes led me to.

group_1.textLeft: Your kindness seems natural to me at least.

group_1.textRight: Then in the spirit of kindness, would you@like for me to mend your scars, too?

group_1.textLeft: You may leave them as they are.

group_1.textRight: "We predators cannot be saved..."

group_1.textLeft: Miss Chika...

group_1.textRight: What lessons are to be learned from@wounds inflicted by others...?
Who on earth gave them to you?

group_1.textLeft: So you realized they were inflicted by human hands?

group_1.textRight: Yes, because I'm a hunter, too.
If you're okay with it,@can you tell me what happened...?

group_1.textLeft: ...With the head of the clan traveling to my@hometown, the truth shall inevitably come out...

group_1.textRight: So...

group_1.textLeft: ...I hail from Yukuni City, a hot springs resort@ensconced between the mountains and the sea.
Many of the students there@are aware of Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: And not simply that. They are also aware@of the dangers that Witches pose,
and of the fate of Magical Girls...

group_1.textRight: That can't be...
So if things go poorly, everyone will think—!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that we are evil creatures that exist@to fulfill wishes and harm others...
I don't need to tell you the rest.@I'm sure you understand, Miss Chika.

group_1.textRight: So those people...
They gave you those scars@because you were a Magical Girl...
Jeez, hang on!
Here I was thinking we were gonna talk about@lunch, but shit got really dark instead...
So you're saying everyone in town got@together to torment the Magical Girls?

group_1.textLeft: You cannot demonize the people as a whole.
When disgust turns to anger,@and anger into violence,
the friends you had yesterday are gone...

group_1.textRight: You couldn't bring yourselves to fight back...

group_1.textLeft: In their eyes, Magical Girls are@responsible for all the world's evils.
If one of us tried to fight, she would only be targeted@further, creating yet more suffering for the rest...

group_1.textRight: Surely there must've been other Magical@Girls in Yukuni aside from you, right?
Who are they? If we can group up with them―

group_1.narration: "As ordinary people cannot perceive Witches,@then when Magical Girls disappear,@people don't assume that's what we've become..."
"Rather, the people believe that they have@successfully protected themselves,@which only ratchets their hostility towards us,@and further fuels their campaign@to eliminate Magical Girls..."
"We had the opportunity to regain their trust,@but failed, and thus only the four of us remain..."
